docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration today issued new regulations that will bar the labeling of dietary supplements with health claims that have not been proved truthful and scientifically valid. The ruling will not affect supplements with labels that do not make health claims.

headline.main: U.S. Issues Rules on Diet Supplement Labels

docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration today issued new regulations that will bar the labeling of dietary supplements with health claims that have not been proved truthful and scientifically valid.   The ruling will not affect supplements with labels that...

docs.lead_paragraph: THE shroud of darkness that precipitates the winter blues is gradually being lifted by scientists who have found aberrations in the biological clocks and brain chemistry of people who become depressed and lethargic when the days grow short. The findings have yielded a better understanding of how the brain responds to light and dark, along with new and simpler treatments for winter depression, or seasonal affective disorder.

headline.main: Scientists Find Ways to Reset Biological Clocks in Dim Winer
